title: If you post in here, I'm gonna random Nintendo fact/thing you
body:
Like this one:

http://68.media.tumblr.com/1bee264a3f2dc98017e30c5746fa20d1/tumblr_olxp7dWkX61rrftcdo3_r1_250.png

http://68.media.tumblr.com/30d09b49a50368f703f09895411482fd/tumblr_olxp7dWkX61rrftcdo2_r1_250.png

http://68.media.tumblr.com/4b6ca0e3fd609ed93ffa93d5681672ca/tumblr_olxp7dWkX61rrftcdo1_500.gif

In Mario Tennis for the Nintendo 64 contains a model viewer within a dummied-out debug mode that can be accessed with cheats. This feature allows us to see what the player characters’ models look like before animation data is applied to them.

Top: DK as he normally appears in the game. 
Middle: DK’s default model before animations are applied. 
Bottom: 360-degree view of DK’s default model.
